title: Inspur Showcases at 2025 ASEAN AI Malaysia Summit
description: KUALA LUMPUR, Malaysia, Aug. 19, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- August 12-13, the 2025 ASEAN Artificial Intelligence Summit grandly opened at the Malaysia International Trade and Exhibition Centre (MITEC), with Inspur as an invited participant. Inspur showcased its AI-related technologies, products, solutions, and application scenarios at the summit's exhibition, facilitating strategic partnerships during the event.

title: Metal Organic Frameworks Market worth $1.70 billion by 2030 at 22.1%, says MarketsandMarkets™
description: Delray Beach, FL, Aug. 20, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- In terms of value, the Metal Organic Frameworks Market  size is estimated at USD 0.51 billion in 2024 and is projected to reach USD 1.70 billion by 2030, at a CAGR of 22.1%, as per the recent study by MarketsandMarkets™. The growth of metal organic frameworks is driven by several factors. Rising demand for efficient gas storage solutions and increasing shift towards clean energy is driving the adoption of metal organic frameworks in several industries. Metal organic frameworks find its uses in gas adsorption, gas separation, sensing & detection, catalysis, and water harvesting applications due to its unique properties such as high porosity, larger surface area, structural diversity, and tunable pore size. Emergence of artificial intelligence and machine learning for identifying and selecting perfect metal organic frameworks for various applications is likely to boost the demand for metal organic frameworks market.
content: Delray Beach, FL, Aug. 20, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- In terms of value, the Metal Organic Frameworks Market size is estimated at USD 0.51 billion in 2024 and is projected to reach USD 1.70 billion by 2030, at a CAGR of 22.1%, as per the recent study b... [6814 chars]

title: Jack Neo uses AI to create SG60 song with AI image of Lee Kuan Yew
description: Local film-maker Jack Neo has created a new music video in conjunction with the month of National Day, using artificial intelligence (AI) technology to recreate images such as the appearance of Singapore's founding prime minister Lee Kuan Yew and his voice.

title: Asian shares retreat, tracking tech losses on Wall Street
description: Asian shares retreated on Wednesday, tracking a decline on Wall Street led by technology shares including Nvidia and other stars that have been riding the mania surrounding artificial-intelligence. title: ChatGPT Go Vs ChatGPT Plus Vs ChatGPT Free: Which One Should You Pick?
description: Artificial intelligence company OpenAI now offers three ChatGPT plans. While the free plan offers basic access with limited features, there are two paid versions that come with more features. OpenAI’s recently announced ChatGPT Go costs Rs 399 per month. The affordable subscription plan has been introduced for Indian users.

title: Anurag Kashyap slams Vijay Subramaniam for ‘Made-in-AI’ film on Hanuman: ‘You should be in the gutter’
description: Anurag Kashyap slams Vijay Subramaniam for ‘Made-in-AI’ film on Hanuman: ‘You should be in the gutter’. Kashyap criticised Subramaniam, producer and founder of the Collective Artists Network, for using artificial intelligence in his upcoming film 'Chiranjeevi Hanuman – The Eternal'
